fullplot: Spain, 1966, a high-school English/Latin teacher, Antonio, drives to Almeria in hopes of meeting his hero, John Lennon. Along the way, Antonio picks up two runaways. The movie title, Living is Easy With Eyes Closed, comes from a line in Lennon's song Strawberry Fields Forever which he wrote while filming How I Won the War in Almeria.
plot: In Spain in 1966, an English teacher picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon.
title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
